headline: Blackstone’s Jon Gray Warns Against Knee-Jerk Reactions to Tariffs
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray warned investors against making knee-jerk decisions around President Donald Trump’s tariff drama and instead advised waiting to see how the underlying negotiations play out.Most Read from BloombergThey Built a Secret Apartment in a Mall.
